criteria.name: Financial Performance
criteria.shortDescription: Evaluates the company's financial health and profitability.

importantMetrics.name: Revenue Growth
importantMetrics.description: Measures the increase in a company's sales over a specific period.

importantMetrics.name: Net Income Margin
importantMetrics.description: Indicates how much profit a company makes for every dollar of revenue.

importantMetrics.name: Funds from Operations (FFO)
importantMetrics.description: A key performance indicator for REITs, reflecting cash generated by operations.
importantMetrics.formula: net_income + depreciation + amortization - gains on sales

reports.name: Financial Summary Report
reports.description: Provides a comprehensive overview of the company's financial performance, including revenue growth, net income margin, and FFO.

criteria.name: Market Positioning
criteria.shortDescription: Assesses the company's competitive position within the real estate market.

importantMetrics.name: Market Share
importantMetrics.description: Represents the company's portion of the total market sales.

importantMetrics.name: Tenant Diversification
importantMetrics.description: Evaluates the diversity of the tenant base to mitigate risk.

importantMetrics.name: Geographic Diversification
importantMetrics.description: Assesses the spread of properties across different regions to reduce location-specific risks.

reports.name: Market Position Report
reports.description: Analyzes the company's market share, tenant, and geographic diversification to determine its competitive standing.

criteria.name: Operational Efficiency
criteria.shortDescription: Measures how effectively the company manages its operations and resources.

importantMetrics.name: Occupancy Rate
importantMetrics.description: Indicates the percentage of rented or used space compared to the total available space.

importantMetrics.name: Property Management Costs
importantMetrics.description: Evaluates the expenses associated with managing properties.

importantMetrics.name: Lease Renewal Rate
importantMetrics.description: Measures the percentage of leases renewed at the end of their term.

reports.name: Operational Efficiency Report
reports.description: Examines occupancy rates, property management costs, and lease renewal rates to assess operational effectiveness.

criteria.name: Rental Income Analysis
criteria.shortDescription: Focuses on the company's ability to generate rental income from its properties.

importantMetrics.name: Average Rent per Square Foot
importantMetrics.description: Calculates the average rental income per square foot of property.

importantMetrics.name: Rental Income Growth
importantMetrics.description: Tracks the increase in rental income over time.

importantMetrics.name: Rent Collection Rate
importantMetrics.description: Measures the efficiency of rent collection from tenants.

reports.name: Rental Income Report
reports.description: Provides insights into average rent per square foot, rental income growth, and rent collection efficiency.
